questions.question: What is the primary role of a Security Engineer?
options: B. Designing and implementing security solutions

questions.question: Which of the following is a key responsibility of a Security Engineer?
options: A. Conducting security audits and assessments

questions.question: Which encryption protocol is commonly used for securing wireless networks?
What is the main function of a VPN in cybersecurity?
options: B. Creating a secure encrypted connection over a public network

questions.question: Which security model focuses on enforcing access control based on classification levels?
What does IDS stand for in cybersecurity?
Which of the following is an example of a network security protocol?
What is the main goal of penetration testing?
options: A. To assess and identify security vulnerabilities
C. To train employees on software usage
D. To improve graphic design skills

questions.question: Which of the following is a fundamental aspect of secure coding?
options: D. Storing passwords in plain text

questions.question: What is a common method used to protect against DDoS attacks?
Which tool is commonly used for network vulnerability scanning?
What is the purpose of a security incident response plan?
options: A. To guide an organization in handling security breaches
C. To manage employee leave schedules

questions.question: Which of the following best describes zero-trust security?
options: A. Assuming that all network traffic is secure
B. Granting unrestricted access to employees
C. Verifying every access request, regardless of origin

questions.question: What type of attack exploits software vulnerabilities before they are patched?
Which of the following is an example of an access control mechanism?
What is the main purpose of endpoint security?
options: A. Protecting devices from cyber threats

questions.question: Which of the following is a commonly used hashing algorithm?
Which security principle ensures that data is not altered without authorization?
What does SOC stand for in cybersecurity?
Which law regulates data protection and privacy in the European Union?
